name: ONI (itch) (Griggy)
description:
A game by Alex Lazea. This game was made in 2 weeks for the Mech Jam 3. Enjoy!

Update
  • V0.3.0 Latest [07/24/22]: This version introduces a number of UI and AI fixes. Also features some improvements to the character controllers.
  • V0.1.9 [07/22/22]: Original release.
Intro

Welcome to the ultimate test of strength, speed, and instinct. The year is 2357, wars are fought and won by Mecha pilots called ONIs. To be an ONI you must be fierce and fearless in the face of danger like a demon.

Choose amongst Three of the most powerful warriors in the solar system!

Battle to the death across Four different arenas built for champions!

Battle to the very end by throwing devastating attacks at your enemy to deplete their health before they do the same to you. You will have to block, dodge, and counter your opponent to win in this battle.

How To Play

Attack your opponent and block their incoming attacks to reduce the opponent's health to 0. You must do this before the timer runs out otherwise the player with the most health left wins. Face off against a CPU opponent or challenge your friends.

Known Issues and Missing Features

Due to to the tight two week deadline, there was no time to implment and fix everything. Below is a list of issues and features that I will hope to address over the next several weeks.

  1.  Need to add controller support.
  2. Improved AI.
  3. UI improvements.
  4. Fix weird bug where certain VFX objects don't go away.
  5. Fix issue where character the controller fails to turn around if spamming attack. This affects the player and CPU.
  6. Fix some lighting issues and use lightmaps for better performance.
  7. Add new combat moves such as heavy attacks, grabs, projectiles, and dash attacks.
  8. Add a training mode allowing players to practice on a CPU dummy.
  9. Might add an Arcade mode.
  10. Further balance improvements.

*Please provide feedback and note of any issues found.
